DOC.brief_summary: The main aim present study compare bioavailability vitamin D cod liver oil multivitamin tablet give healthy individual condition , well study influence gender ethnicity vitamin D absorption . Healthy subject randomise two parallel group receive 10 microgram ( 400 IU ) per day vitamin D3 one fish oil capsule one solid multivitamin tablet , respectively . Serum sample draw baseline four week ( 28 day ) analysis 25-hydroxyvitamin D , 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D , parathyroid hormone , tartrate resistant acid phosphatase serum .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Vitamin D Cod Liver Oil Multivitamin Tablets Healthy Subjects Norway
DOC.criteria: Must able meet baseline followup visit Using vitamin D contain supplement regularly ( > per week ) Travelled sunny country previous 3 month Used tan bed previous 3 month
